title: Lowest Terrestrial Protected Areas
description: In 2018, only 0.05% of Micronesia's total land area was designated as terrestrial protected areas, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Lowest Mobile Cellular Subscriptions
description: As of 2021, Micronesia had only 19.45 mobile cellular subscriptions per 100 people, indicating low mobile penetration.

title: Highest Education Expenditure
description: In 2021, Micronesia spent 23.63% of its GNI on education, one of the highest rates in the world.

title: High External Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, 77.25% of Micronesia's current health expenditure was funded externally, indicating a high reliance on external sources.

title: Lowest Road Traffic Mortality
description: In 2019, Micronesia had a road traffic mortality rate of 0.2 per 100,000 population, one of the lowest globally.
